name: QuickTouch Technologies Limited
description: QuickTouch Technologies Limited (www.quicktouch.co.in) is an NSE Emerge - listed software development company based out of New Delhi and Bengaluru. Our 10-year-old company went public this May’23 and made waves in the market by getting oversubscribed 107 times! Since then, we have begun our expansion spree and are diversifying our offerings to match various business needs in the fields of EDuTech, Payments, FinTech and InsurTech. Our blockbuster product - school management software with QuickCampus.online which is EduTech Marketplace is currently powering over 3,700 plus schools in India. Quicktouch aspires to achieve phenomenal success in the business by proposing innovative and exemplary IT Development services (Payments, SaaS Products, FinTech, InsurTech, Consulting, Growth Marketing, Website Design & Development, Mobile APP Development, SEO, PPC & Social media Marketing). Traditional development services are time-consuming and expensive, which is why our approach is to deliver something that is not only unique but also cost-effective.
business_objectives: Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Build Your Business With Quicktouch
ShortDescription: Quicktouch, aspire to achieve phenomenal success in the business by proposing innovative and exemplary IT Development services. Traditional development services are time-consuming and expensive.
enhanced_description: QuickTouch Technologies Limited, an NSE Emerge-listed software development company founded in 2013, provides innovative and cost-effective IT Development services. While their portfolio spans EduTech (e.g., QuickCampus.online, a school management software powering over 3,700 schools in India), Payments, FinTech, and InsurTech, their offerings also align with HR technology needs. Specifically, QuickTouch leverages Digital Accelerators, Cloud Adoption, Content Engineering, Artificial Intelligence (AI), and Internet of Things (IoT) to develop Training eLearning software and provide solutions designed to help organizations accelerate skill development and learning efficiency, and build a more diverse and inclusive workforce.
competitive_advantages: Proven market success (NSE Emerge listed, IPO oversubscription indicating strong demand)
Extensive experience (10 years in the market since 2013 launch)
Large customer base in EduTech with a flagship product (QuickCampus.online powering over 3,700 schools)
Commitment to delivering unique and cost-effective IT solutions
Ability to reduce development time and expense compared to traditional methods
Diversified service portfolio across multiple industries (EduTech, Payments, FinTech, InsurTech)
roi_benefits: Improved skill development within the workforce
primary_users: Organizations seeking custom IT development and consulting services
deployment_options: Cloud-based (for QuickCampus.online and potentially other SaaS products)
scalability_features: Designed for scalability (evidenced by powering over 3,700 schools with QuickCampus.online)
Cloud-enabled architecture (supports scalable solutions through Cloud Adoption capabilities)
